name: Minhaj TV
description: This app presented by Minhaj-ul-Quran Inernational. It contains thousands of lectures, speeches and bayans on different Islamic topics such as Quran Majeed, Tafsir-ul-Quran, Hadith, Aqaid, Sirat-ur-Rasool, Sprituality and Current Issues in English, Urdu and Arabic languages.  Minhaj-ul-Quran International (MQI) is a Pakistan-based international organization, working to promote peace, tolerance, interfaith harmony and education, tackle extremism and terrorism, engage with young Muslims for religious moderation, promote womens rights, development and empowerment, and provide social welfare and promotion of human rights.  Minhaj TV mobile app launching ceremony was held on June 9, 2018 at the Itikaf City. Shaykh-ul-Islam Dr Muhammad Tahir-ul-Qadri launched the app by formally opening it on the mobile. Thousands of video speeches are available on this mobile app. Some important features of the app are as under:   Year-wise archive of speeches from 1982 onward  Category-wise approach to the speeches  Provision of search option  Availability of thousands of clips  Addresses according to the important Islamic months  Shaykh-ul-Islam Dr Muhammad Tahir-ul-Qadri receives no royalties from his publications which include his numerous books, DVDs and public speeches. He has dedicated all of his past, present and future royalties to Minhaj-ul-Quran International.
